DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Sirolimus stent implantation effective reduce neointimal hyperplasia compare Bare metal stent diabetic patient de novo coronary artery stenosis .
DOC.brief_title: Sirolimus-Eluting Stent Versus Standard Stent Diabetic
DOC.criteria: Diabetic either noninsulin insulindependent ( accord World Health Organization Report ) pharmacologic treatment ( insulin hypoglycaemic agent ) least 1 month , present de novo coronary stenosis 1,2 3 native vessel symptom objective evidence ischemia . Stenoses amenable stent implantation , vessel size small 4.0 mm ( assess visually angiography ) Impaired glucose tolerance without pharmacologic treatment , gestational diabetes transient hyperglycaemia Stenoses locate saphenous bypass , arterial bypass grafting , unprotected leave main involve important side branch ( > 2 mm ) treat procedure Left ventricle ejection fraction < 25 % Prior treatment intracoronary brachytherapy drug elute stent target site Restenotic lesion ; know allergy aspirin , ticlopidine clopidogrel acute coronary syndrome persistent ST elevation < 72 hour and/or CPK twice upper normal limit NonST elevation acute coronary syndrome CPK twice upper normal limit Severe hepatic renal disease ( creatinin clearance < 30 ml/min hepatic enzyme twice upper normal limit ) ; life expectancy < 1 year
